name: One Last Fight
description:
Are you ready for your last fight?

Embark your ship, choose your favorite weapon and prepare yourself.
Waves of countless enemies are coming to defeat you.

You’re going to lose.
You can cry on a friend shoulder, it’s okay.
But after that, you’ll try again. And again. Wave after wave…

You have to show to your friends you’re not afraid of challenge.

You have to beat this entire spacecrafts army.

It’s going to be hard but you have to do it.
This is your last fight.
